error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key. Please check your ElevenLabs API key.

abort.already_configured: ElevenLabs Custom TTS is already configured with this API key

init.title: Voice Profile Management

data.action: What would you like to do?

data_description.action: Choose an action to manage your voice profiles

add_profile.title: Add New Voice Profile
add_profile.description: Create a new voice profile with custom settings. Voice ID can be obtained using the 'Get Voices' service.

data_description.profile_name: A unique name for this voice profile (e.g., 'Gary', 'Narrator')
data_description.voice: ElevenLabs Voice ID (use the 'Get Voices' service to find available voice IDs)
data_description.model_id: ElevenLabs model to use (e.g., eleven_turbo_v2_5, eleven_multilingual_v2)
data_description.stability: Voice stability - lower values add more variability (0.0-1.0)
data_description.similarity_boost: How closely to match the original voice - higher is more similar (0.0-1.0)
data_description.style: Style exaggeration - higher values are more expressive (0.0-1.0)
data_description.speed: Speech speed multiplier - 1.0 is normal speed (0.25-4.0)
data_description.use_speaker_boost: Enhance speaker clarity and reduce background noise

modify_profile.title: Modify Voice Profile
modify_profile.description: Select a voice profile to modify

data_description.selected_profile: Choose which voice profile you want to edit

edit_profile.title: Edit Voice Profile
edit_profile.description: Modify the settings for this voice profile. Voice ID can be obtained using the 'Get Voices' service.

data_description.profile_name: A unique name for this voice profile (e.g., 'Gary', 'Narrator')
data_description.voice: ElevenLabs Voice ID (use the 'Get Voices' service to find available voice IDs)
data_description.model_id: ElevenLabs model to use (e.g., eleven_turbo_v2_5, eleven_multilingual_v2)
data_description.stability: Voice stability - lower values add more variability (0.0-1.0)
data_description.similarity_boost: How closely to match the original voice - higher is more similar (0.0-1.0)
data_description.style: Style exaggeration - higher values are more expressive (0.0-1.0)
data_description.speed: Speech speed multiplier - 1.0 is normal speed (0.25-4.0)
data_description.use_speaker_boost: Enhance speaker clarity and reduce background noise

delete_profile.title: Delete Voice Profile
delete_profile.description: Select a voice profile to delete

data_description.profile_name: Choose which voice profile you want to remove permanently

error.profile_exists: A profile with this name already exists

get_voices.name: Get Voices
get_voices.description: Retrieve all available voices from ElevenLabs API
